analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x2b08f3ab8986075f8691ea9abc393642964e64c5.sol:
	Contract SolarDaoToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x2b08f3ab8986075f8691ea9abc393642964e64c5.sol#178-179)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
